creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: a gray, ghostly figure with streaming black hair descends from the sky, a comet-like tail trailing behind him/her; a red, white, and blue object falls from the sky alongside the figure; two figures crouch down at the bottom of the scene, hands raised, while a third figure stands tall, holding a large hand fan mounted on a long stick; the three lower figures appear fearful
inscription:
Inscription and Seal

Five rectangles in UR with Japanese script; a small fish below the right-most rectangle also with Japanese script
markings: Red circular seal at base of oblong cartouche LRQ.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper, mounted as a scroll
title: Ghost Story "Sarayashiki Kesho no Sugatami"
